name: Admin in English with Switch
author: Armen Danielyan

sections.description:
Sometimes we want the front end of our blog to be translated for the users, but keep the backend admin panel in English. Admin in English with Switch does just that. It lets you switch your backend administration panel to English from admin toolbar, even if the rest of your blog is translated into another language. This plugin allows turning English language on and off for each user’s back-end independently.

For more information about original Admin in English plugin please visit https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/admin-in-english/ page.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip admin-in-english-with-switch--x.x.zip
  2. Upload the admin-in-english-with-switch directory (not its contents, the whole directory) to /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed the “Call to undefined function wp_get_current_user()” bug.

1.0

  • Initial version.

short_description: This plugin is an extended version of Admin in English plugin (v1.2) developed by Nikolay Bachiyski. See the Description for more details.
